analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x8e35c59c2c0d3150f6f1c03cacd1f1707824e393.sol:
	Contract CoinMarketCapToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x8e35c59c2c0d3150f6f1c03cacd1f1707824e393.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x8e35c59c2c0d3150f6f1c03cacd1f1707824e393.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
